channel.title: Football on SPMC Project
channel.description: Recent content in Football on SPMC Project

item.title: Is Baker Mayfield overrated?
item.description: I am a Browns fan but don’t ask me why. I have been a fan of the team since I was 12 years old and have experienced a lot of agony in those years. This past season our starting quarterback Baker Mayfield led us to the playoffs and gave us our first playoff win since 2002. But yet, I still hear over and over again “Baker Mayfield is overrated,” so I wanted to test this assumption and match up his year three stats to the other 31 starting quarterback’s with their year three stats.
